test_table.comment: This table stores unique records identified by an integer ID, each associated with a production line code (line_cd). The metric data represents categorical identifiers for manufacturing lines, enabling analysis and filtering by specific production lines. There are no explicit time-related dimensions in the table; the primary dimension is the production line category, which organizes records by manufacturing line codes.

monthly_production_metrics.comment: This table stores monthly production metrics for manufacturing equipment, including work time, downtime, breakdown time, idle time, production quantity, defects, and rates like availability, performance, quality, idle, and breakdown. Data is organized by time (critn_yyyymm), factory (fact_nm), production line (line_cd, line_nm), and specific equipment (plant_nm). Additional reliability metrics like MTBF and MTTR are included, along with audit info (reg_id, reg_dts).
